sentences.en: All the new rules do is exempt the user from legal liability - something Apple does not appear to be pursuing anyway.
sentences.cn: 新法规做到的仅仅是免除了用户的法律责任 - 看起来苹果本来也不打算追究这种责任。

sentences.en: Children under two years are exempt.
Eligible for the SME credit guarantee agencies are exempt from sales tax.
sentences.cn: 对符合条件的中小企业信用担保机构免征营业税.

sentences.en: He is exempt from military service, because of his bad health.
sentences.cn: 他由于身体不好而免服兵役.

sentences.en: He is exempt from punishment about this thing.
sentences.cn: 关于此事对他已免于处分.

sentences.en: Members of the service staff shall be exempt from dues and taxes on the wages which they receive for their services.
sentences.cn: 服务人员就其服务所得之工资免纳捐税.

sentences.en: Men in college were exempt from military service.
sentences.cn: 大学在校男生免服兵役。

sentences.en: Sells the room to exempt the land increment duty personally.
sentences.cn: 个人卖房免土地增值税.

sentences.en: She is exempt from sex discrimination laws.
sentences.cn: 她免受性别歧视法的追究。

sentences.en: So empirical approaches to literature, the simple observation of data from which one can generalize -they exempt these from the general charge against literary theory.
sentences.cn: 文学的经验主义研究方法，对我们所概括的事物的简单数据观察,对文学理论的普遍控诉中,他们免除了这些。

sentences.en: So we have the current argument over how much of the derivative market will be exempt from regulation.
sentences.cn: 所以我们就看到了当前有关衍生产品市场到底有多大份额可以得到规则的豁免的辩论。

sentences.en: Soldiers were exempt from paying rates.
South Carolina claimed the power to exempt its citizens from the obligation to obey federal law.
sentences.cn: 南卡罗来纳州宣称有权使其公民免除遵守联邦法律的义务。

sentences.en: The fund was in danger of losing its tax-exempt status.
sentences.cn: 该基金面临不再享受免税待遇的风险。

sentences.en: The interest on the money is exempt from tax.
There are exempt goods such as financial services, education and health.
sentences.cn: 诸如金融服务 、 教育和保健属于免税品.

sentences.en: These goods are exempt from customs duties.
To produce enterprise, can quite exempt from enterprise income tax reductions or.
sentences.cn: 对农产品初加工企业, 可以减征或免征企业所得税.

sentences.en: Under international law, diplomats living in foreign countries are exempt from criminal prosecution.
sentences.cn: 根据国际法，驻外外交官员免受刑事检控。

trans.tran_en: not affected by something, or not having to do it or pay it
to give someone permission not to do or pay something
to give someone permission not to do or pay something
